name: SimpleProfiler
description: A simple profile library, allows to measure time for a single, or multiple, or consecutive calls of arbitrary code block. It uses `millis()` and `micros()` functions to measure time. Provide API to measure any modifiable value to collect statistics (e.g. bytes, ticks, etc.).
keywords: profiler, profiling, c++, performance, tool, statistics, time, measure, benchmark, debug
